Package io.micronaut.security.oauth2.endpoint.token.request.context

Class OauthPasswordTokenRequestContext

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.security.oauth2.endpoint.token.request.context.AbstractTokenRequestContext<Map<String,String>,TokenResponse>
io.micronaut.security.oauth2.endpoint.token.request.context.OauthPasswordTokenRequestContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
TokenRequestContext<Map<String,String>,TokenResponse>
public class OauthPasswordTokenRequestContext extends AbstractTokenRequestContext<Map<String,String>,TokenResponse>
A token request context for sending a password grant request to an OAuth 2.0 provider.
Since:
1.2.0
Author:
James Kleeh
